form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE OF AN ALIEN, FORM 1-550 ( (REV. 5-1-72N)

full_text: UNITED STATES JUSTICE Screened VNARA. 6/1/2023 FORM APPROVED. IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE OMB NO. 43-R0368 APPLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE no document FEE STAMP OF AN ALIEN Submitted MEXICO Take or to- IMMIGRATI ND NATURALIZATION SERVICE, CONSULATE, MAY 22 1973 In connection with immigrant visa application(s) of my relative(s) listed in item 15 below, that the American Consul at HERMOSILLO, SONORA, MEXICO be furnished a verification of my lawful admission into the United States (City and Country abroad) for permanent residence. I have read and fully understand the instructions appearing on the reverse of this form concerning the AMERICA desirability of attaching documentary evidence to prove relationship if the immigrant visa applicant is my parent, spouse, or unmarried child under the age of 21 years. 1. MY NAME IS (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 2. MY ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER IS ROCHA-ELENES, Luis A 1 30 773 654 3. MAILING ADDRESS IN U.S. /Number and Street) (City) (State) (Zip Code) 4. MY DATE OF BIRTH IS: (Month) (Day) Year) 3139 S. C St., Oxnard, California 93030 July 15, 1910 5. MY FATHER'S NAME: 6. MY PLACE OF BIRTH WAS: (City) (Country) Aniceto Rocha Ormiguero, Sinaloa, Mexico 7. MY MOTHER'S FULL MAIDEN NAME: 8. I AM NOW A CITIZEN OF: (Country) Juana Elenes Mexico IN FORMATION IN THESE BLOCKS PERTAINS TO MY ADMISSION INTO THE UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE 9. NAME USED WHEN ADMITTED FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE: (Last) (First) (Middle) 10. MY U.S. PORT OF ARRIVAL WAS: ROCHA-ELENES, Lu√≠s Calexico, California 11. MY DATE OF ARRIVAL WAS: (Month) (Day) (Year) AND THE MEANS OF ARRIVAL WAS: (Show Name of Vessel or Airline and Flight No., etc.) March 16, 1971 on foot 12. NAME AND ADDRESS OF PERSON IN THE U.S. TO WHOM I WAS DESTINED: ROsa Rochin, Oxnard, California 13. I first obtained an immigrant visa at a United States consular office abroad on (date) (location). At that time, was was not married Hermosillo, Son., Mex Mar, 1971 14. Including my present marriage I have been married 1 times. The name of my present spouse is: Isabel Casares de Rocha to whom I was married on at Sinaloa, Mexico If married more than one time. list (date) (location) names of previous spouse(s) and places and dates of marriage and explain how marriage(s) were terminated: n/a 15. THE PERSONS IN WHOSE BEHALF SUCH INFORMATION IS REQUESTED ARE AS FOLLOWS: FULL NAME DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH ISABEL CASARES DE ROCHA 7-8-13; Los Mescales, Sinaloa, RELATIONSHIP ADDRESS Wife Dom. Con. Los Mescales, Sinaloa, Mexic FULL NAME DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH P.D. pet/ben HER 5 RELATIONSHIP ADDRESS A NOT B/C M/C pet/ben D/C pet ben FULL NAME DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH 1.550 RELATIONSHIP ADDRESS Date: NOT TO BE FILLED OUT BY APPLICANT 16 BULL SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT AS NOW USED The Secretary of State is hereby informed that the subject named X Suis Rocha Elenes above was was not lawfully admitted for permanent residence. His "A" file shows the following: A Date of First Admission for Permanent Residence: 3-16-71 Symbol SA-1 Issuing Post and Date of Issuance of IV: 3-15-71 Mermedillo Marital status/at time of first admission: INS OFFICE for Single: Married: Divorced: LAWFUL Widowed ADMISSIO VERIFIED Date: 5/14/73 Verifier: Contact Representative USINS Marting FORM I-550 (REV. 5-1-72)N
